issue.title: audiocircuit.dk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://audiocircuit.dk/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faudiocircuit.dk%2F) ### Comment > page opens then popup displays ``` Username: @enduser1 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/lufmcdexgogoko0k8wwosk4gcog04csk967g4p338g.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:

AdGuard Other Annoyances,
